content: Do you remember my favorite cryptos?

I don’t have your favorite cryptos saved yet.

## TL;DR
- Tell me your top 3–5 coins (tickers are fine), and I’ll remember them going forward.

## Quick picker
- Common picks to choose from (just reply with your list):
  - BTC, ETH, SOL, XMR, ADA, AVAX, LINK, ATOM, DOT, KAS
  - Any stablecoins? USDC, USDT, DAI

## Optional details (if you want me to track them)
- Long-term vs. trading list
- Target buy/sell ranges
- Alerts (price thresholds or news triggers)

I don’t have your favorite color saved yet.

## TL;DR
- Tell me your favorite color (and any hex code if you’re picky), and I’ll remember it.

## Quick picker
- Common picks: blue, green, black, purple, red, teal, orange
- Designer picks: #0EA5E9 (sky), #22C55E (emerald), #6366F1 (indigo), #F97316 (orange), #111827 (near-black)

## Optional details
- Light vs. dark theme preference
- Accent color for charts/UI
- Alternate palette for print or presentations
